tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
tosdr.tldr: If we make any material changes to this Privacy Policy, we'll notify you of those changes by posting them on the Services or by sending you an email or other notification, and we'll update the "Last Updated Date" above to indicate when those changes will become effective.

9383.quoteText: You may not use our service for any unlawful purposes or illegal activities.

9386.quoteText: Gab’s policy is to follow all applicable laws in The United States of America, the Constitution and the Supreme Court’s rulings on the First Amendment.
